prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in music emotion analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the music, please predict the emotion conveyed by the music.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is the music conveying a sense of relaxation[0], happiness[1], sadness[2], or anger[3]?
